Posts.Content: Jan 1, 2008 07:27PM tupee wrote: Hi! My mom went through breast cancer and radiation in September. She just went for her follow-up mammogram and has had a discharge for the past week. Doctor said this happens sometimes. Does it? I am worried about it. the mammogram came back ok, but the discharge and pain have lasted. Anyone go through this?
Posts.Title: soreness 6 weeks later pamh tupee
